title: Doodle Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 10 Doodle sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/ov6Eot3m3Kg


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 12 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Doodle 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Doodle 02_#[512,288].png 1024x576

● Doodle 03_#[512,288].png 1024x864

● Doodle 04_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Doodle 05_#[512,288].png 1024x1152

● Doodle 06_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Doodle 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1613

● Doodle 08_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Doodle 09_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Doodle 10_#[512,288].png 1536x1152


Number of Textures: 10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
